page.title: 10RELIGION IN OLDBURY
page.content: {THE CHAPEL.}Oldbury on Severn has a Methodist Chapel. The Chapel is in the middle of the village. The Chapel's services are held on Sunday evening, the average attendance is about 12. The weekly meeting for prayer and fellowship is held on Tuesday afternoon at the home of one of the villagers. The Sunday School which is held in the Chapel meets there at 11.00 a.m. each Sunday. {THE CHURCH.}The Church is on top of a hill overlooking Oldbury. There are several services on a Sunday at Oldbury church. The Church uses old books. The King James Bible, and the book of common prayer. The average attendance at Oldbury Sunday School is 14.
